website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use handheld lighter with good ergonomics and a child safety switch.
pros: USB lighter has a brushed metal handle, which helps you maintain grip
Charges within a few hours for up to 300 uses per charge
Has an indicator light to alert you when the battery charge is low
cons: Lighter's buttons can sometimes be difficult to press, leading to problems with activation

customer_reviews.title: Neat and handy lighter
customer_reviews.text: This product is so handy and works perfectly. I love how easy it is to turn the lighter on and use immediately, especially since it’s much easier than a normal lighter. It seems to hold battery charge for a long time, but the fact that it can even be recharged is amazing. It’s long and slim so it can reach into my candles to light them where other lighters can’t since I can’t ignite them inside that small space. I also love that you have to turn the lighter on for it to be used. My little boys aren’t able to accidentally use it.
customer_reviews.author: M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bad switch design for extended usage..needs a thumb support to prevent slippage.longer electrode tip
customer_reviews.text: Great idea..use it to light pipe for med mj..poor switch design.. thumb slides off and switch mechanism is sketchy..can't see it holding up for long..electrode tips uneven..intermittent arcing..was great out of box..after week of use..acting up..do some design upgrades and it will be very good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use and Works!
customer_reviews.text: We primarily use this lighter for candles but overall, I'm impressed with how simple and effective it is. Comes with a charging cable and seems like it will last a while before needing to be recharged. The feel is durable so I anticipate it lasting a long time. Only word of caution is there is no child resistant features, so keep that in mind for households with children.
customer_reviews.author: Wojo

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a little awkward
customer_reviews.text: You must first press and hold down a button until the LEDs light up, then shift your grip and slide the trigger forward to extend the electrodes. The Suprus lighter (plain black cylinder) lets you do it all in one motion of your thumb, and costs less to boot. I prefer that one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Baird

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get it going but it works
customer_reviews.text: At first it wouldn't work properly and I almost through it away. I held onto it and kept trying to use it until i finally got a hang for it. Glad I didn't toss it. I cleaned the tips because stuff would get stuck on it as I was lighting candles. So far, so good. I like that it's long so I can reach deep into tall glass candles without getting dirty. I used to have to strategically drop matches hoping it could get it to light my tall candles.
customer_reviews.author: Lilah

customer_reviews.title: Defective and better arc lighters out there
customer_reviews.text: This lighter went out after 4 days. It’s hard to use because you need to power charge button before each time you light. Sending back because doesn’t work even though i charged it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and solid build quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by how solid this thing feels in your hand. You just hold the on button for three seconds and slide the arc forward to light. I lie that the arc tip goes back into a case when it’s not being used (no cap to put on). It has a neat sound, almost a light buzzing. It charges in about an hour. My only criticism is that the cord connecting the unit to a USB charging source is like two or three inches long, very short. I really love this for lighting candles. No more worrying about whether we are low on lighter fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I have a gas stove and one of the lighters for one of the burners does not work. This Arc lighter is perfect for lighting my stove. It keeps a great charge and works with ease. Unlike some of the "click" lighters, even someone with arthritis or other hand debilitation could operate this lighter. Super pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly losing my candle lighting lighter. Someone accidentally takes it or it gets misplaced. I was so excited to see this and skeptical of how it would work... But as soon as I got it I went around the house and hunted down every candle to light them. Haha. It's just so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, works great....until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: The lighter worked really well for the first 2 months. I only had to charge it a couple of times and charging did not take long. However, after 2 months it stopped working. The indicator says it is fully charged, but no arc light. There is nothing I can do and obviously do not want to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like something out of a scifi movie!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cool! I’ve had it since November and have not had to charge it yet! I only use it for lighting candles though so that may be why. However, it’s still great quality, hasn’t messed up on me in anyway and fells really great in you hand.
customer_reviews.author: vitamin b

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter. Comes very well packaged and looks sharp. Feels very nice in the hand and very easy to use. Hold the power button for 3 sec then slide the slide up to light. Works great for starting gas grill, candles, and fires, Dont smoke but sure it will work just fine for that too. Charges really fast and holds the charge well. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very modern and elegant at kitchen counter. Very easy to use. We charged only once since bought it. Works really well. Much better than traditional lighter with open fire.
customer_reviews.author: peter pan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, and enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric lighter I've owned. I'm really enjoying it. Easy to charge, easy to use, and no lighter fluid to deal with. Love, and recommend it to anyone who hates buying new lighters or refilling messy refillable fluid lighters.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderkitty

customer_reviews.title: Sparks every time
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift as a early Christmas present and they are ecstatic. If used it multiple times to light the grill and gas appliances in the home with ease. Charges quick and instructions easy to read. Definitely recommend this Arc lighter
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one of these forever ago!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this to light Firestarter's for our Kamado Joe grill. It lights up everything quickly. There are no fumes and I bet it would be great for camping trips or in a survival pack/hurricane box etc. I also used it to light a wooden wick candle that doesn't light up right away and it did immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this lighter. Mine failed after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this lighter. Mine failed after a couple of weeks. Too bad I can't return it. It's too late. Buy this one:
customer_reviews.author: Phillip T Connolly

customer_reviews.title: great for people with hand issues
customer_reviews.text: With age her hands have made it harder to use the "do two things at once" fuel based lighters. This one does the trick with only one finger and no dual action. Great for people that have issues with hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin E

customer_reviews.title: Quick charge and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, and what a great alternative to the disposable lighters that you get in the store, or matches! I charged the light up in my office while I worked. Just plugged it into the USB charger on the side of my laptop. A couple of hours later it was fully charged and I lit a candle! That easy!
customer_reviews.author: G.H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable lighter? Who knew! A++
customer_reviews.text: OK this is the coolest lighter I’ve ever had! I love candles and don’t like the idea of open flames in the house or lighter fluid with a young child. This replaces several lighters that I use in the house and I think it’s fabulous that it’s rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: Mona G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This lighter is great. It comes fully charged and is perfect for the candles that are towards the end where you can’t reach the wick with a regular lighter. The long neck on the lighter is perfect for candles and grills. It’s easy to use and easy to charge. It works in all types of wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Safer than flame, and faster to set fire to items
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and much safer than other lighters. Only wish the child proof switch can be disabled. (Have to hold the on button for a few seconds)
customer_reviews.author: Raleighs

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and effective lighter
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the actually lighter. I have another electric lighther but like this one better since it’s longer. I use it to burn all my tealights! It’s very easy to use too! I’m overalls happy with the design.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Better than matches
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted one of these! It charges well and lasts a while. I use it to light our fireplace and it gets the job done. It makes a little bit of a buzzing sound but that's normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek. Good battery.
customer_reviews.text: Alittle bigger then I pictured, but works great. I like the retracting feature for the prongs. And I have only charged it once and I use it every day a couple times and I’ve had this for about 2 months now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I really think this is one of the coolest things I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Entertainment Diva

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the coolest lighter tool I’ve seen. It is easy to use, holds a charge, and is rechargeable!!! Leaving this out on a mantle is not an issue as it has a beautiful sleek design. Charges via a usb cable that is included. A must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Justus

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lighter
customer_reviews.text: This lighter is pretty cool. I love the no flame, easier to use if there is a breeze. Lighting candles is very easy. The charge hasn't died yet, I might be annoyed when it does, batteries might be a better option but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JSlater

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighter.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well to light my candles. I like that it doesn’t need actual flames. I like that it’s recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Has21

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Lighter!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than any lighter I have ever used! I have used it to light candles but my husband has used it to light the grill and neither of us have had issues! It doesn't get hot like a lighter does!
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: very useful, great eco alternative
customer_reviews.text: works great. holds a charge. very sleek and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sorcery
customer_reviews.text: There is a tiny power button it took me a minute to find, but otherwise this is great! I have no idea how it works and it makes me feel a little like a wizard.
customer_reviews.author: megangehr

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got a similar one of these last month. Liked it so much I bought this one for a gift. Great for candles or the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The igniter in our grill broke so I purchased this mainly for that but it also works great for candles. The fact that it’s rechargeable is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Classy Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I use it to light votive and larger candles at work, sometimes outdoors. Really like the appearance. I am constantly asked about it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: Product packaged nice but not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in really nice box. It charged fairly quickly but when i went to use it I was really unimpressed at its ability to light my candles this holiday season. I will be giving it another try and will update my review accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Ferragut

customer_reviews.title: Makes an ear piercing ring or whistle that some ppl hear and some don't!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. But that piercing sound is awful. Oddly only some ppl can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This lighter is perfect for my candles that burned down but still have wax , it’s so easy to light them now ... it’s long enough not to get lost but small enough to put in a kitchen draw ! I love the fact that I don’t have to buy any type of lighter fluid
customer_reviews.author: shana moseley

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I am not a smoker so i don't keep lighters around, but this thing is great for everday use. Candles, Lighting the BBQ are what i mostly use it for, and works great
customer_reviews.author: Kyle N.

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for lighting candles. I love the length of it. The battery life lasts a while and it is easy to use. I have many candles so this will be put to good use and I hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hay

customer_reviews.title: Never buying regular lighters again.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my husbands stocking stuffer. Charge lasts forever. It’s worked every time and great for lighting candles and camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well. Very safe and reliable. Lit my candle in a matter of seconds. Battery last long and it charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shakilah Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Super modern look.
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek and modern look. Easy to use. We love it. Goodbye matches. It makes burning fire in the fireplace so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Liebs Fam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lighter! The hubby absolutely loves it and says it’s the easiest to use. He loves you can just charge it up and reuse it again.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works as expected. Only takes a few minutes to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Langer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Do NOT waste your $. Broke after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: was what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to order more but you were out of them Just love mine
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Grill and candle flameless lighter
customer_reviews.text: I like that there's no real flame. Used it to light candles
customer_reviews.author: ChristineÂ Brushie

customer_reviews.title: well built product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture and description. Very satisfied with my purchase, already been showing it off to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Sonik Jhang

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lighter for a year. I hardly use it and now it doesn't work! Did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Seville

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Never going back to the traditional lighters anymore. So easy to use and love the recharge factor.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. Works like a dream. My husband calls it brilliant idea. Game changer for the lighter world!
customer_reviews.author: ChristieH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of filling my butane lighter and having to use two hands to press the button and pull the trigger. It was difficult to light and usually didn't work despite its having butane in it. So, while this electric arc lighter was a bit pricey for a lighter, I decided to go for it. And, I am so glad I did! It's sleek and beautiful, works single handedly and...WORKS EVERY TIME! I plan to gift this around to friends — they don't know what they're missing.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and practical.
customer_reviews.text: This device is very slick! It’s so cool the way it ignites. It charges very quickly and holds the charge for many, many lights . It’s nice not having that nasty sulfur smell of a match! It has a very nice, long reach to allow you to get down into tight spaces to light your candles or incense.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sowers

customer_reviews.title: At 18 months, I'm very happy with the value
customer_reviews.text: Mine sits in my bathroom, where it is primarily used to light a couple of candles for a bath every few days. Once in a while it lights some incense or whatever. So I'm not using it 10x/day, but I can vouch for super-reliable occasional use. Do you know that I forgot it was rechargeable? I think this is only the second time I've charged it in 18 months. That battery life makes me happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Works well. No charging cord.
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it works as intended. It’s didn’t come in a box like previous reviews had mentioned. It came in a clear plastic bag with no instructions. I’m giving it 3 stars due to the fact that there was no charger included and the add notes a charger would be included. I’m an iPhone user and don’t have the cord needed to charge this so I will have to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Lilmama

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool to keep at home
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of an electric lighter. I prefer to use the electric ones over regular lighters or matches. This is a handy tool to keep at your home. It's safer and easier to use. I like how the hand grip is designed ergonomically as well. The price is pretty reasonable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dong S. Park

customer_reviews.title: Two units failed with in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The first lighter i bought worked well for a few months and then the on off switch began to fail. The second one failed completely afte a few months. Based on my experience, I would not recommend these lighters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoa - firestarter
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. We are always looking for a lighter. But when we find one, it is out or broken. The lighter felt natural in my hand and I did not have any issues using it. I will have to hide it away from my little kids, they were intrigued by it. I just need to remember where I put it! Haha
customer_reviews.author: MLCPDX

customer_reviews.title: Works easily
customer_reviews.text: Using a Butane lighter can be a real pain, especially if it is cold and is child proof. This lighter is easy to use and so far works as expected. Time will tell about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy and will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s purpose, just wish the handle was the same size through out and not as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Erika A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This lighter is a amazing. It's like magic! Super convenient when lighting candles. You don't have to tip the candle sideways since there is no open flame. This is the future!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for those with less strong hands. My wife said it looked like a piece of art. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I was obsessed with this lighter for a week, until it stopped working... piece of junk, STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Jacroux

product_meta.title: Sugoiti Electric Arc Lighter Rechargeable Flameless Safety USB Windproof Candle，Gas Burner, Camping Stove Trips，Arc Flame Fits for Home Kitchen，Fireworks No Spark & Smell
product_meta.description:
NEWEST Electric ARC Lighter - Sugoiti Rechargeable Flameless Safety USB Windproof Candle，Gas Burner, Camping Stove Trips，Arc Flame Fits for Home Kitchen，Outdoor Party Sports Activities and BBQ Grilling Fireworks No Spark & Smell

MORE FEATURES:
- Built in rechargeable lithium battery that uses a USB wire (included). A full charge requires 2-3 hour.
- Safety switch to provide maximum safety. In addition, when you slide the ignite switch down, the plasma arc will initiate for 10 seconds then shut off in order preserve battery life.
- Windproof plasma arc provides easy and effective use on a windy day.
- Fashionable design.
- Sleek zinc alloy body.
- No butane, so you never have to worry about running out of fuel. Avoid harmful chemicals and be eco-friendly.
- Battery indicator is located in front of the lighter (4 lights). Each light represents 25% power. When all four lights are on, the lighter is at 100% power. 
- Long neck provides access to hard to reach places and keeps your hand a safe distance away from fire.

SPECIFICATIONS:
Item Size: 226x35x21mm
Packing size:270x70x39mm
Material: Zinc alloy
Charge time: 2-3 hours
Power: USB DC 5V / 1.0A

PACKAGE INCLUDES:
1 x Sugoiti Electric Arc Lighter
1 x Micro USB Cord

NOTES:
1. Slide the safety switch and then press the power button under it to produce arc.
2. DO NOT touch the arcs with hands.
3. Please keep away from children.
4. Use away from face, skin, metallic and flammable clothing.
5. Don't place the lighter in water or other liquid to avoid short circuit.
6. Unplug the lighter as soon as blue light turns off to last battery life.
feature_bullets: ✔ERGONOMIC DESIGN, SAFER & MORE DURABLE - Sugoiti electric arc lighter use more innovative technologies to optimize the durability and performance. Childproof safety switch prevent it from starting accidently while not in use. Sleek with solid zinc alloy, The handle is polished and plated, and the brushed panel is used, which has a good grip feel, unlike cheap plastic lighters broke or melt easily.

✔USB RECHARGEABLE & BATTERY INDICATOR - The USB lighter charged like a cell phone via SUPPLIED micro USB cable, save your money on disposable lighters. High quality lithium battery, 2-3 hour fast charge last at least 300 times. Smart chip features 6s automatically shut off.

✔NO SPARK NO SMELL & SAFTY DESIGN - Use cleaner electricity versus butane or other traditional fuel, no open flame or smell. The Sugoiti arc instantly catches whatever you are trying to light on fire, it does anything a traditional lighter can do but safer and more environmentally friendly.

✔FLAMELESS, WINDPROOF - Thanks to the flameless plasma technology that is windproof & moisture proof, it works perfect even in a wind. Easy to carry for both indoor and outdoor use, ideal for candles, gas & propane stoves, pipes, BBQ grills, camping, hiking, fireworks etc. Please don't touch the arc with hands to avoid burns.
✔Wide Application: Not only for start fire for candles, BBQ grill, camping fire and etc but also come with gift box as a ideal gift to your friends.
